title: Equation Quantum Solver
paragraph: D-Wave Quantum Computer allows you to implement optimization problem solver. Here we use it to find the solution of a set of equations with more variables than equations.

title: CNN Audio MNIST CLassifier
paragraph: Audio classification is a task that can be useful in many fields. Here I implement a simple model to perform it using Convolutional Neural Network on the audio MNIST dataset.

title: Brest cancer classification
paragraph: Machine Learning models can be used to predict disease from clinical data. In this project, I compare the performance of different models varying hyperparameters.

title:
Probabilistic 
 Game of Life
paragraph: Game of Life is a famous deteministic complex system. In this version there are random events that modify its original behaviour changing its complexity class.
